import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Accordion, Icon, Header, Label } from 'semantic-ui-react' class DropDown extends Component { state = { activeIndexs: [] } handleClick = (e, titleProps) => { const { index } = titleProps const { activeIndexs } = this.state const newIndex = activeIndexs const currentIndexPosition = activeIndexs.indexOf(index) if (currentIndexPosition > -1) { newIndex.splice(currentIndexPosition, 1) } else { newIndex.push(index) } this.setState({ activeIndexs: newIndex }) } render() { const { activeIndexs } = this.state const colors = [ 'red', 'orange', 'yellow', 'olive', 'green', 'teal', 'blue', 'violet', 'purple', 'pink', 'brown', 'grey', 'black', ] const name = [ 'CS 2110', 'CS 2800', 'MATH 2940', ] let zip = (a1, a2) => a1.map((x, i) => [x, a2[i]]); return (

Student
{colors.map((color) => ( ))}
CS 2110
CS 2800
Math 2940

TA
CS 1110
) } } export default DropDown
